mail.subject: Cairn.info: Password reset
mail.body:
You're receiving this e-mail because you requested a password reset for your Cairn.info account. Please click on:
http://[URLSITE]/motdepasseoublie

If you need help using our website, please contact our technical support..

We hope that you will visit our website.

Cairn.info team.



-----------------------
Cairn S.A.
58/60, rue des Champs
B-4020 Liège
BELGIQUE
Conditions générales de vente :
